text:
Word problems - when two equations will equal each other - Math test answers

[imath] \mathbf{q} [/imath]\n0\n(1) Sam and Hector are gaining weight for\nfootball season. Sam weight 205 pounds and is gained two pounds per week. Hector weight 195 pounds but it's gained three pounds per week. And how\nmany weeks will they both weight at the\nsame amount?
